Posts.Content: my psa is between 38 to 40 11 of the 12 biopsy are cancer gleason score of 7 cancer is on both sides of prostate had a ct and bone scan didn't show any signs in the tissue around the prostate the is seen in the ct and bone scan the doctor gave me 2 choices radiation therapy or remove the prostate I feel no signs of the prostate cancer as if there is nothing wrong I live in Warren, Michigan I have plan f coverage it is the best coverage for health care I am looking for the best doctor and hospital to be treated by in Michigan if possible but I will travel to find help Please reply back to me at my <email and phone redacted> leave me your phone number and I will call you back I need your help or someone to talk to me about what happen after the treatment Ron Florka
